mapper.select: select * from product_info order by prod_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into product_info(prod_id, prod_name, prod_price, prod_rating, prod_desc, prod_imgsrc, prod_count, prod_date) values(prod_id_seq.nextval, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_rating}, #{prod_desc}, #{prod_imgsrc}, #{prod_count}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update product_info set prod_price = #{prod_price}, prod_rating = #{prod_rating}, prod_desc = #{prod_desc}, prod_count = #{prod_count}, prod_date = #{prod_date} where prod_id = #{prod_id}
